text.tspan: Lead concentrations in the blood of children in the United
Lead concentrations measured in blood samples from children aged one to five years old.
Children are particularly vulnerable to lead poisoning and can suffer permanent impacts on the development of the brain and

text.textPath: 5 µg/dL = WHO maximum threshold for lead exposure
5 µg/dL = WHO maximum threshold for lead exposure

text.tspan: Data source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention; National Center for Health Statistics
